author: mrmitch
title: Toddlers love this little  Clown train
review: This little set works quite well. The wheels stay on the track and you simply push the little clown around and around. Duplo sets are very few in my collection but my children and other toddlers who have played with it love this little set. I believe that the set was around six US dollars. Highly recommend for 18 month or older small kids.
